name: Dice Revenge
description:
Dice Revenge!

In the world of dices, where idyll reigned for centuries, since the beginning of time there had been an eternal dice - a powerful artifact that maintained harmony and order. But one day it cracked. At the same moment, portals opened, from which invaders from a parallel world rushed into the world of dices, eager to take possession of the eternal dice.

 

The main character was an ordinary family man who lived in his cube house and raised a lovely daughter with a dice head, together with his beloved dice wife. But during the opening of the portals, the invaders destroyed his house and killed his family while the hero was away from home. When he returned, the hero discovered that his family was dead and vowed to embark on the path of retribution.
